text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As the Spring Tenno Sho draws ever<n>closer, Mejiro
McQueen's training<n>regimen intensifies.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant... I believe I'mgetting better at controlling mybreathing.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Well, that brings us to the end of<n>today's regimen. Do you
have<n>anything else for me?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Just letting you know, I still have<n>plenty of energy left.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It does look like a little more wouldn't<n>hurt today. I'll let her
do as she<n>wishes.
choice_data_list: All right, let's have another go at it.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It does look like a little more wouldn't<n>hurt today. I'll let her
do as she<n>wishes.
choice_data_list: All right, let's have another go at it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hehe, of course. It's much too early<n>to be stopping today.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Off I go, then!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Strangely enough, this feels as ifMcQueen and I are truly trainingtogether for the first time since Itook over the team.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I suppose it helps to share a singular<n>goal to work toward.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I suppose it helps to share a singular<n>goal to work toward.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Hey there, Trainer! McQueen's<n>lookin' better than ever!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Hi, Ryan.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Hi, Ryan.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Ryan smiles brightly, like a<n>weight's been lifted off
her shoulders.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
McQueen's improved mood is<n>without a doubt thanks to
Ryan's<n>advice.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Now that my rival's back in the game,<n>it looks like I've gotta
crank my own<n>spring Tenno Sho prep work up to<n>200%!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Heheh, don't mention it! Man, I sure<n>am glad I was able to
talk to you about<n>it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Really lookin' forward to race day.<n>But just know that I'll
be the one<n>takin' home that win!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The spring Tenno Sho is shaping up<n>to be a race we won't
soon forget. I<n>need to make sure that McQueen's in<n>top
condition.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The spring Tenno Sho is shaping up<n>to be a race we won't
soon forget. I<n>need to make sure that McQueen's in<n>top
condition.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The next few days fly by in a flash.<n>The day of the spring
Tenno Sho is<n>upon us.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: What are you thinking of eating after<n>your win?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Hm? Ah, yes. Well... Since we're in<n>Kyoto, maybe some
Kyoto cuisine.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Sounds... good.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Trainer... You are abysmal atlightening the mood.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Seems that way...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Come now, get it together. That's<n>something that you
should have a<n>handle on as a trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I'm starting to become worried that<n>those frazzled nerves
will rub off onto<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's times like these that I wish I had<n>my mentor's sociable
personality.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I may not be very good at helping my<n>trainee relax, but...
choice_data_list: I'll cheer you on twice as loud to make up for it.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I may not be very good at helping my<n>trainee relax, but...
choice_data_list: I'll cheer you on twice as loud to make up for it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hehe... Yes, please do.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
My dream lies in wait right before my<n>very eyes. All that's
left is to go out<n>there and grab it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you! I'll be coming back with<n>trophy in hand!
